Help: wgGallery

Description

wgGallery module can be used for presenting your images in albums within your XOOPS

Install/uninstall

No special measures necessary, follow the standard installation process and extract the wggallery folder into the ../modules directory. Install the module through Admin -> System Module -> Modules.

Detailed instructions on installing modules are available in the XOOPS Operations Manual

Features

The wgGallery module continues to expand, to get to the conditions to create modules, more and more sophisticated.
For this reason, I invite all developers to report and send on github any changes or additions to this module, so that we can jointly contribute to the development

Tutorial

You can find a more detailed to tutorial on GitBook
